Belgium:
Compromise of Nobles petition Margaret of Parma to suspend the laws on heresy.
Philip II of Spain authorises Margaret of Parma to abolish the inquisition in the Habsburg Netherlands.
Iconoclastic Fury: churches and monasteries vandalised and plundered in many parts of the Habsburg Netherlands.
Malta: The founding of Malta's new capital city, Valletta.  A general strengthening of Malta's fortifications is undertaken.
Slovenia: The region of Prekmurje is occupied by Ottomans during the Siege of Szigetvar.
